Description détaillée
Common GLPI object
Documentation des constructeurs et destructeur
__construct() __constructCommonGLPI CommonGLPI__construct
__construct ( )
Constructor.
Declared in interface to ensure that getItemForItemtype() will be able to create an instance of CommonGLPI without having to pass any parameter.
Implémente CommonGLPIInterface.
Réimplémentée dans Auth, et LevelAgreementLevel.

Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
can() canCommonGLPI CommonGLPIcan
can ( $ID, $right, array & $input = null )
Check rights on CommonGLPI Object (without corresponding table) Same signature as CommonDBTM::can but in case of this class, we don't check instance rights so, id and input parameters are unused.
Paramètres
integer$ID
ID of the item (-1 if new item)
mixed$right
Right to check : r / w / recursive / READ / UPDATE / DELETE
array$input
array of input data (used for adding item) (default NULL)
Renvoie
boolean

boolean
